item.title: 【Introductions & Farewells】Greetings From Live Music Heaven
item.description:
Hey guys!

Does anyone have music videos from Lee Ryan, especially Turn Your Car Around and Army Of Lovers?

I appreciate the help.

Thanks!
item.author: ijwthstd

item.title: 【HD Live Performances】WEB-RiP - Perrie - Capital Summertime Ball 2024 h264.1080p.AAC.GlobalPlayerRIP
item.description:
By way of introduction I have been recording and trading concerts since 1988. I have been mostly posting to my own personal blog titled same as my user name with the occasional torrent and also just about wrapping up a personal project of transferring thousands of recordings my recently deceased friend made between 1971 and 2017 more recently using anniversary dates as a guide to wrap it up. This is more of a lifestyle than a hobby.

I am winding it down to passive listener as after posting some 20TB the past few years I am inundated with re-re-repost requests when I am really only interested in recording shows and finding stuff to put out a first time but seems my pop related stuff will have more appreciation here than the classic rock-centric trading world so I might start over with some of that stuff while keeping an eye out for the kinds of things I enjoy finding.

When I have some time I will drop my Spice Girls collection.
item.author: harmonizer54
